participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

PSQI_01.LongName:
During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night?
PLEASE USE 24-HOUR CLOCK

PSQI_02.LongName: During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?

PSQI_03.LongName:
During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?
PLEASE USE 24-HOUR CLOCK

PSQI_04.LongName: During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spent in bed.)

Levels.3: 3 hours

PSQI_05a.LongName: Cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_05b.LongName: Wake up in the middle of the night or early morning

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_05c.LongName: Have to get up to use the bathroom

Levels.3: Three or more times a week
Three or more times a week
Three or more times a week
Three or more times a week
Three or more times a week
Three or more times a week
Three or more times a week

PSQI_05j2.LongName: How often during the past month have you had trouble sleeping because of this?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_06.LongName: During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?

Levels.3: Very bad

PSQI_07.LongName: During the past month, how often have you taken medicine to help you sleep (prescribed or "over the counter")?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_08.LongName: During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_09.LongName: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?

Levels.3: A very big problem

PSQI_10.LongName: Do you have a bed partner or room mate?

Levels.0: No bed partner or room mate
Levels.2: Partner in same room, but not same bed
Levels.3: Partner in same bed
Three or more times a week

PSQI_10b.LongName: Long pauses between breaths while asleep

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_10c.LongName: Legs twitching or jerking while you sleep

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_10d.LongName: Episodes of disorientation or confusion during sleep

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_10e3.LongName: How often during the past month has this occurred?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

PSQI_11.Description:
Minimum Score =0 (better); Maximum Score = 3 (worse) | Calculation = iif([PSQI_04]>=7, 0, 0) + 
iif([PSQI_04]==6, 1, 0) + 
iif([PSQI_04]==5, 2, 0) + 
iif([PSQI_04]<=4, 3, 0)

PSQI_12.Description:
Minimum Score =0 (better); Maximum Score = 3 (worse) | Calculation = iif( [PSQI_23] == 0, 0,
(iif( [PSQI_23] <= 9, 1,
(iif( [PSQI_23] <= 18, 2,
(iif( [PSQI_23] > 18, 3, 'ERROR')))))))

PSQI_13.Description:
Minimum Score = 0 (Better); Maximum Score = 3 (Worse) | Calculation = iif( ([PSQI_05a] + [PSQI_24]) == 0, 0,
iif( ([PSQI_05a] + [PSQI_24]) <= 2, 1,
iif( ([PSQI_05a] + [PSQI_24]) <= 4, 2,
iif( ([PSQI_05a] + [PSQI_24]) <= 6, 3, 'ERROR'))))

PSQI_14.Description:
Minimum Score = 0 (Better); Maximum Score = 3 (Worse) | Calculation = iif( ([PSQI_08] + [PSQI_09]) == 0, 0,
iif( ([PSQI_08] + [PSQI_09]) <= 2, 1,
iif( ([PSQI_08] + [PSQI_09]) <= 4, 2,
iif( ([PSQI_08] + [PSQI_09]) <= 6, 3, 'ERROR'))))

PSQI_15.Description:
Minimum Score = 0 (Better); Maximum Score = 3 (Worse) | Calculation = iif ([PSQI_27]>=85, 0,
 (iif ([PSQI_27]>=75, 1,
  (iif ([PSQI_27]>=65, 2,
   (iif ([PSQI_27]<65, 3, 0)),
  0)),
 0)),
0)

PSQI_16.Description: Response to question 6. Minimum Score = 0 (better); Maximum Score = 3 (worse) | Calculation = [PSQI_06]

PSQI_17.Description: Response to question 7. Minimum Score = 0 (better); Maximum Score = 3 (worse) | Calculation = [PSQI_07]

PSQI_18.Description: Minimum = 0(better); Maximum Score = 21 (worse); Interpretation: Total <=5 associated with good sleep quality; total >5 associated with poor sleep quality | Calculation = [PSQI_11]+[PSQI_12]+[PSQI_13]+[PSQI_14]+[PSQI_15]+[PSQI_16]+[PSQI_17]

PSQI_24.Description:
For internal use only. | Calculation = iif( [PSQI_02] <= 15, 0,
iif( [PSQI_02] <= 30, 1,
iif( [PSQI_02] <= 60, 2,
iif( [PSQI_02] > 60, 3, 0))))

PSQI_26.Description:
For internal use only. newtib | Calculation = iif((to_utc([PSQI_03]) >= to_utc([PSQI_01])), 
((to_utc([PSQI_03]) - to_utc([PSQI_01])) / (60 * 60 * 1000)), 
(((to_utc([PSQI_03]) - to_utc([PSQI_01])) + 86400000) / (60 * 60 * 1000)))

PSQI_27.Description: For internal use only. TMPHSE | Calculation = ([PSQI_04]/[PSQI_26])*100
